Screens Details: Authentication: Login integrated (same `/auth/login` for all roles). JWT is decoded to extract `roleCode` and `employeeId`; Driver role is auto-detected.
Issues details: Depends on physical device networking (LAN host + HTTP cleartext allowed).
Query: Is the Driver login flow complete?
Answers: Yes: `POST /auth/login` via Redux Toolkit thunk with token persistence, role mapping, and employeeId extraction.

Screens Details: Session: Logout integrated (clears token/state) with confirmation modal and toast.
Issues details: Role preservation for UX (keep role/roleCode) handled.
Answers: Token + auth-related state is reset; user returns to login flow; toast is shown.

Screens Details: Driver Details API binding: Driver name/employeeId/status are fetched from backend using `employeeId` from JWT.
Query: If backend response shape changes, mapping may need updates.
Screen status: Yes: `GET /driver/details/:employeeId` with bearer token; stored in Redux state and bound to UI.

Screens Details: Performance: Driver details fetch is deduplicated to avoid repeated API hits (dev re-render/screen focus).
Issues details: Repeated requests on multiple mounts were causing extra hits; guard added.
Answers: Yes; now a dedupe guard (loading/succeeded + same employeeId) prevents unnecessary requests.

Screens Details: Driver Profile tab: Header shows dynamic EmployeeName + EmployeeId + Status.
Issues details: If token is missing employeeId, fallback handling is required.
Query: What is shown on Driver Profile header?
Answers: Driver name, employee id, and status are shown dynamically from Redux state.

Screens Details: Driver Profile Info: Detail screen shows dynamic Age/Email/Phone/Address from backend.
Issues details: Some fields may be null; safe fallbacks are used.
Answers: Yes: details are read from Redux; missing fields fall back safely.

Screens Details: Update Driver Profile: Edit screen form is prefilled using navigation params and `react-hook-form` `setValue`.
Issues details: Prefill depends on passing `driverDetails` via route params.
Answers: Yes: name/age/email/phone/address prefill works; improves UX without UI layout changes.

Screens Details: Change Password: Driver change-password API integrated; mismatch guard; success toast; forced logout (token cleared) after success.
Answers: Success toast is shown and the user is auto-logged out (re-login required).

Screens Details: Error handling: Consistent thunk error handling + Redux error state; toasts on failure.
Query: How does the user see errors?
Answers: Toasts + Redux error state; no crash, graceful failure paths.

Screens Details: Android networking: Enabled cleartext HTTP + network security config (main + debug) for local backend hits on physical devices.
Issues details: After native changes, reinstall app is recommended; firewall/binding must allow LAN.
Query: Why did “Network request failed” happen on device?
Answers: Cleartext blocked + incorrect host; network config + LAN baseUrl resolved it.

Screens Details: Maps: Driver map screens include Directions polyline + ETA/distance integration.
Issues details: Directions API key authorization/restrictions required; otherwise warning may appear.
Query: How is the Driver route line drawn?
Answers: `MapViewDirections` draws the route and `onReady` updates distance/duration.

Screens Details: Next: Multi-stop optimized route (pickups → school) for driver runs.
Issues details: Backend must provide stops/coords; Directions `optimizeWaypoints` support required.
Answers: Google Directions with `optimizeWaypoints=true` returns the best stop order (time/distance optimized).
